summary: 3D open-world narrative game with advanced AI-driven NPCs, inspired by *The Young and the Restless*, featuring an original adult-oriented storyline (~100+ hours), player-created protagonist, and branching choices with multiple side storylines.
architectural_notes: Target platform/engine TBD; project is explicitly 3D open-world with AI-heavy NPC simulation needs.
IP consideration: inspiration from an existing TV soap opera may require originalization/renaming or licensing strategy.
known_issues: Potential IP/trademark/copyright risk due to explicit inspiration from *The Young and the Restless* and interacting with its characters; may require licensing or fully original setting/characters.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Game title screen background: moody upscale suburban night scene with soft cinematic lighting, no text (title-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Game logo mark: minimalist dramatic emblem (e.g., rose + broken ring motif), monochrome (logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
- Quest journal icon set: 6 small UI icons in a consistent line style (journal-icons.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create an MVP gameplay loop (vertical slice) for a 3D third-person open-world narrative game: a small explorable neighborhood map, player movement/camera controls, and interactable NPCs that trigger dialogue and quest choices.
Implement player-created protagonist setup with character customization options for appearance and personality/traits, and persist the selected configuration for the logged-in user.
Add a branching dialogue and choice system that supports: multiple dialogue nodes, player choices, conditional availability based on traits/flags, and consequences that update persistent game state.

Implement simplified “advanced AI-like” NPC behaviors using deterministic state machines (not external ML): daily schedule states, wandering/idle, reacting to player proximity, and relationship-driven dialogue availability.
Add quest and side-story infrastructure: quest definitions, objectives, branching outcomes, and a journal UI that tracks main story and at least 2 side quests for the MVP slice.

Content & compliance guardrails: keep the narrative adult-oriented in tone while ensuring no explicit sexual content is included; also ensure all characters/locations are fully original and do not use or reference copyrighted/trademarked *The Young and the Restless* characters, names, or likenesses.

Define and apply a cohesive visual theme for the UI (colors, typography, layout) appropriate for a mature, dramatic soap-opera-inspired game, and use it consistently across title screen, character creation, quest journal, and dialogue UI.
